titleStmt.title: The resolued gentleman. Translated out of Spanishe into Englyshe, by Lewes Lewkenor Esquier
Chevalier délibéré. English
titleStmt.author: La Marche, Olivier de, ca. 1426-1502.
Lewkenor, Lewis, Sir, d. 1626.

notesStmt.note: A translation of Hernando de Acuña's translation of: La Marche, Olivier de. Le chevalier délibéré.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
